channel.title: Are people who like porn, idiots, faggots, or just plain stupid
channel.description:
did poeple in the 1800s have porn like today? NO! it's just that todays crapped up society has a long history of evolving into pervs who hate the law and think people are there for thier own selfish gain. People that wanna use porn should be warned that it will ruin you life. Get married! get a girlfriend! stop killing! stop the freaking narcotics! anyone whom agrees are very bright and actualy have brains. others should prove to me how what i say is wrong.
+~+~LET THE WAR BEGIN+~+~ [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/warnpmod.gif[/img] Provoking flame wars, and generally being an idiot. [/center]
